content: top of the st-double_crochet to complete the last corner per side 12dc 4hdc 2sc 1 chain-5 space per corner 2dc ch2 2dc 5 round 9 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1dc in each of the next 3 sts do not skip the 1st hidden st skip 2 sts dc2togcl ch1 twice dc2togcl in the next st skip 2 sts 1dc in each of the next 2sts 1hdc in the next st now working in the sts from round 7 and the chain-5 space skip st 1 half_double_crochet in the next st and around the chain- 5 space 3sc in the chain-5 space skip 3 sts ch2 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next st and around the chain-5 space skip st now working in the sts from round 8 1hdc in the next st 1dc in each of the next 2 sts skip 2 sts dc2togcl ch1 twice dc2togcl in the next st skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch3 to complete the last corner per side 10 double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 3sc 6 dc2togcl 4 ch1-sps per corner 2dc ch2 2dc round 10 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1dc in each of the next 5 sts do not skip the 1st hidden st 1fphdc around each of the next 3 dc2togcl 1hdc in each of the next 5 sts 1sc through the chain-2 space from round 7 and the next st this should be the centre single_crochet from round 9 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 1fphdc around each of the next 3 dc2togcl 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch3 to complete the last corner per side 10dc 10 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 6 fphdc per corner 2dc ch2 2dc 6 round 11 ch2 this counts as your 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1hdc in each of the next 31 sts do not skip the hidden st 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2hdc ch2 2hdc 2hdc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch2 to complete the last corner per side 31hdc per corner 2hdc ch2 2hdc round 12 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *ch1 skip the 1st hidden st 1dc
